alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:21AM EST until December 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Occasional lake effect snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow will be positioned north of the Thruway tonight, then slowly drift southward through the day Monday. Highest snowfall accumulations expected north of the Thruway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
